allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Agentforce integration, Salesforce metadata, services, and UI enhancements

Adds server-side proxy, Agentforce client, Gemini/Imagen/CMS/Commerce/DataCloud
services, customer personas, product staging, persona selector, profile panel,
welcome screen, suggested actions, and Salesforce project metadata.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
